subject: Self Care
title: Finding Your Purpose
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Finding Your Purpose.

hook.text: The janitor at NASA was asked what he did for a living. He said: 'I'm helping put a man on the moon.' Purpose transforms work.

buildup.text: Purpose is the sense that your life is directed toward something meaningful beyond yourself. It's the why behind the what.

discovery.text: People with a strong sense of purpose live up to seven years longer, have lower dementia rates, and recover faster from illness.

twist.text: Purpose doesn't need to be grand. Raising kind children, supporting your community, or mastering a craft all count as purpose.

climax.text: Ask: what would I do even if nobody paid me? What breaks my heart about the world? The intersection is where purpose lives.

punchline.text: Purpose adds years to life and life to years. Find yours and follow it.

quiz.question: What health benefit is linked to having a strong sense of purpose?
options: Living up to seven years longer with lower dementia rates
Increased stress from the pressure of purpose
